src:
Kasus Dugaan Korupsi Pjs Dirut PD Pasar Disidangkan November Ini
01 Nov 2019, 14:18 by Yedi Supriadi
BANDUNG, (PR).- Kejari Bandung menargetkan kasus kasus dugaan korupsi yang menyeret mantan Pjs Dirut PD Pasar Andri Salman pada November ini sudah disidangkan. 
Kasub Sidik Pidana Khusus Kejari Bandung Theo Simorangkir mengaku saat ini pihaknya tengah melengkapi berkas setelah sebelumnya dilimpahkan ke jaksa penuntut umum (JPU). Karena ada beberapa unsur yang harus dilengkapi. 
"Kemarin sudah dilimpah ke penuntut umum, namun P19 lagi (dikembalikan). Karena berkasnya ada yang perlu dilengkapi jaksa penyidik," katanya saat dihubungi, Jumat, 1 November 2019. 
Ia menyebutkan, dari hasil catatan jaksa penuntut umum ada 11 item yang harus dilengkapi dalam berkas sebelum nanti masuk ke penuntutan, dan dilimpahkan ke pengadilan. 
"Kita targetkan November sudah rampung dan bisa disidangkan," ujarnya. 
Seperti diketahui, Andri Salman telah ditetapkan sebagai tersangka atas dugaan penyalahgunaan aset deposito senilai Rp 2,7 miliar saat dia masih menjabat Direktur umum dan Keuangan PD Pasar 2017.***

Baca Juga
text:
The Case of Alleged Corruption Acting Director of PD PD Market Trial This November
Nov 01 2019, 14:18 by Yedi Supriadi
BANDUNG, (PR) .- The Kejari Bandung is targeting cases of alleged corruption that have dragged the former Acting Managing Director of PD Pasar Andri Salman this November.
The Head of the Bandung Kejari Special Criminal Investigation Office, Theo Simorangkir, admitted that his party is currently completing the files after it was previously handed over to the public prosecutor (JPU). Because there are several elements that must be completed.
"Yesterday was overflowed to the public prosecutor, but P19 was again (returned). Because there are documents that need to be completed by prosecutors investigating," he said when contacted, Friday, November 1, 2019.
He said, based on the record of the public prosecutor there were 11 items that had to be completed in the file before entering the prosecution, and handed over to the court.
"We are targeting November to be completed and can be tried," he said.
As is known, Andri Salman has been named as a suspect for alleged misappropriation of deposit assets worth Rp 2.7 billion when he was still the General Director and Finance of PD Pasar 2017. ***
